TitleEnglish: A Good Librarian Like a Good Shepherd
SummaryEnglish: The story is set at Shiomi Academy, a vast, prestigious academy with a Daitoshokan (literally, "great library") that rivals Japan's national library. As a member of the Library Club, Kyoutarou Kakei goes to Daitoshokan to enjoy reading by himself. He then meets a second-year girl named Tsugumi Shirasaki through the efforts of a so-called "shepherd" who fulfills people's wishes. Eventually, more girls join the club thanks to the "shepherd."

1.TitleEnglish: Picture Drama 01: Tsugumi Shirasaki & Tamamo Suraba

2.TitleEnglish: Picture Drama 02: Kana Suzuki & Senri Misono

3.TitleEnglish: Picture Drama 03: Nagi Kodachi & Sayumi Ureshino

4.TitleEnglish: Picture Drama 04: Final Edition Nude Queen and Miracle Stone Part 1

5.TitleEnglish: Picture Drama 05: Final Edition Nude Queen and Miracle Stone Part 2

6.TitleEnglish: Picture Drama06: Maho Mochizuki & Aoi Takigawa

1.SummaryEnglish: Kakei spends his days peacefully reading as part of the library club at Shiomi Academy until one day, when he gets an email from the Shepherd...

2.SummaryEnglish: Kakei and the others start their Shiomi Happy Project activities by picking up trash and find a beautiful tuning fork...

3.SummaryEnglish: Kakei and Suzuki get help from the genius of the cafeteria while Shirasaki and the others pay the Song Princess a visit…

4.SummaryEnglish: The Library Club members don costumes to advertise Appllio's Spring Fair and then take a trip to the bathhouse to get to know each other better…

5.SummaryEnglish: The Library Club starts getting more jobs, but this spike in popularity has its drawbacks... Meanwhile, Kakei zeroes in on the Shepherd's identity.

6.SummaryEnglish: Kakei finally pays a visit to the magic library from his visions and learns more about the secrets of the Shepherds.

7.SummaryEnglish: The girls of the Library Club invite Kakei out on a group date, but Kodachi has Shepherd work for him even on his day off.

8.SummaryEnglish: Suzuki writes a play for the Library Club to perform, but will circumstances force her to confront her true self...?

9.SummaryEnglish: As the Library Club prepares for the festival, Misono thinks back on her life of singing and decides what she wants for the future.

10.SummaryEnglish: More is revealed about Kakei and Kodachi's past, and Kakei meets Shirasaki's little sister while Kodachi causes trouble.

11.SummaryEnglish: The Happy Project's Minafes goes head to head with the student council as Kakei makes his decision about being a Shepherd.

12.TitleEnglish: A Good Librarian Like a Good Shepherd
12.SummaryEnglish: It's finally the day of Minafes and the symposium. Which will get more people? Will Kakei be able to save Shirasaki?
